item.title: Adjusting Gait Timing with an ESP32-based Web Framework in MicroPython
item.description: I have been working on this for a while… For the past two Summers I have been teaching a summer camp about “foldable robots”; I teach kids how to make mechanisms with folded cardboard and paper.

item.title: Arduino IDE setup for Dynamixel
item.description: sudo apt install fuse3 libfuse2 libfuse3-3 board libraries https://dl.espressif.com/dl/package_esp32_index.json https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ROBOTIS-GIT/OpenCM9.04/master/arduino/opencm_release/package_opencm9.04_index.json library manager dynamixel2arduino

item.title: ESP32-DOIT Tasmota help
item.description: Make sure you flash the tasmota32.factory.bin image Other than that, you can follow from step 7 of the Sonoff S31 smart plug mod tutorial

item.title: ESP32Cam Info
item.description: Arduino Setup Make sure to prepare arduino for programming the esp32

item.title: Running Ros2 on an ESP32
item.description: Virtualbox guest master setup create a virtual machine Networking: Select bridged networking install ubuntu 22.
